General.Name: CERo Therapeutics Holdings, Inc. Common Stock
General.Description: CERo Therapeutics Holdings, Inc., an immunotherapy company, focuses on advancing the development of engineered T cell therapeutics for the treatment of cancer. Its lead development candidate is CER-1236, an autologous T cell therapy candidate for the treatment of hematologic malignancies and solid tumors. The company was incorporated in 2021 and is based in South San Francisco, California.
General.Address: 201 Haskins Way, South San Francisco, CA, United States, 94080
